topic.title: An Article about distribuite networks like Zeronet
topic.body:
ZeroNet, Diaspora*, Mastodon and the refugee 08chan are analysed with the point of view of hate speech.
https://www.financialexpress.com/opinion/heavy-handed-moderation-and-banning-of-extremists-may-end-up-doing-more-harm-than-good/1672878/

topic.title: 08chan users came from USA and Europe (the map)
topic.body:
https://img.thedailybeast.com/image/upload/c_crop,d_placeholder_euli9k/dpr_1.5/c_limit,w_690/fl_lossy,q_auto/unnamed_1_kw5fqc

A IT tech has studied the IPs of the users of 08chan ZeroNet zite. About half users are not behind TOR wall and a lot has not VPN.

This is the article:
https://www.thedailybeast.com/8chan-users-migrating-to-zeronet-are-accidentally-revealing-their-locations

«The Daily Beast captured 819 IP addresses for 08chan users connecting from 62 different countries. Most users in our sample, 437 of them, are in the U.S., with Canada (46 users), and the U.K. (37), a distant second and third place. Ordered by states, California, Texas, Washington, and Florida top the list.»

topic.title: Half billion records for free in forum from Facebook
topic.body:
https://www.businessinsider.com/stolen-data-of-533-million-facebook-users-leaked-online-2021-4

The personal data of over 500 million Facebook users has been posted online in a low-level hacking forum.

The data includes phone numbers, full names, location, email address, and biographical information.

topic.title: [POLL] Have you been Facebook-powned?
topic.body:
Half billion records for free in forum from Facebook
https://www.businessinsider.com/stolen-data-of-533-million-facebook-users-leaked-online-2021-4

If you are not tech savvy and you want see if your cell number is in the list:
https://haveibeenfacebooked.com/

If you are a tech you can download via Torrent the list with half billion cell numbers:
magnet:?xt=urn:btih:awksoovwotqfcmnhk73j6skkikc3iknk&dn=Facebook%20Leak%20%5B2019%5D%5B533M%20Records%5D%5B106%20Countries%5D&tr=udp%3A%2F%2Ftracker.pomf.se%3A80%2Fannounce

Please post a message with only:

YES if you are powned
or
NO if not

1565583628_1C9SF8vbHqBVYVnqB7zzqZuNjuvXi.body:
> [leftside](#comment_818_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJVoVcDm):  I think this could be easily achieved by modifying a tiny part of the zerotalk .js.Anyway ZeroTalk is managed by @nofish.

For many posts It is advantageous read only the first or two messages and the more recent messages are the best answers to the OP. For few posts I might want to read the entire discussion. So a button resolve the issue for every case.

So @nofish can do the change.

1565321266_1LT3fcyEShsU9E1H5wiBceWmEpU6L.body:
Pay money for have IDs. If you don't want to pay the fee you can execute a precise 0net page with mining js https://github.com/cazala/coin-hive that mine monero cryptocurrency.

https://www.getmonero.org/
Monero is secure
Monero is a decentralized cryptocurrency, meaning it is secure digital cash operated by a network of users. Transactions are confirmed by distributed consensus and then immutably recorded on the blockchain. Third-parties do not need to be trusted to keep your Monero safe.

If you have a normal desktop you execute coin-hive.js for about xx seconds or 1 minute and you get your ID.

If you have crypto you can change it with monero by an Exchange like https://monero.org/services/exchange/

Monery is anonymous.

In the initial phase ZeroID can request to execute coin-hive.js for only a bunch of seconds, with a graph bar from 0% to 100%. If The spam become bigger ZeroID increase the time of execution of coin-hive.js.

If 8chan or other 0page want to limit the spam can oblige users to post messages only with registred IDs.
IDs can also to become of two levels, normal IDs and payed IDs. You can upgrade you ID to payed level if you pay or execute monero js mining code.

8chan can request payed level for the IDs that want to post in its forum. 1 minute of js execution is less for a human but a lot for a bot.

ZeroID can create a multilevel pay IDs with time of execution vary from seconds to many minutes, ten minutes.

1565677132_19ouxiGbVPzjqbCeAWLx4udeggoUs.body:

Yess, I agree. :)

Net0 really? not 0net?

1565699499_1LUP6SN7WrXAH7e5bUFxdmrVsFr2m.body:
> [styromaniac](#comment_978_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): So, some journalists think ZeroNet is a site mirroring service. [...]

A piece of the article says:

«ZeroNet is a peer-to-peer hosting service that downloads website material on behalf of visitors, then serves it back up as a decentralised content delivery network. This effectively performs the same function as Cloudflare, but rather than a single company controlling hundreds of servers, each server belongs to a unique visitor.

Censorship-resistant services have provided refuge for sex workers when a new law tried to prevent free speech about their industry, and more recently for protesters in Hong Kong. Then again, Diaspora and Telegram have both been used by ISIS.»

1565706145_17o47gAF2ADHSuwX4LZxdxzietaPd.body: It maybe contain child abuse, by the way do you have try 08chan.bit?

1565354906_1GFU4qAMTFnQJ7W7r98Zj2xJWq1ev.body:
> [capitanjack](#comment_4_1DNJ1b7d7bqeZHigy35ZKBwwe8PBv8o7Gk): Type netstat and start collectingBut who cares? They are going to jail us just for speaking? Better they should try fixing their heads first :^)They are crazy more most of those 8ch anons

Ahh, yes. The journalist has start Zeronet client, view all the 08chan zite, goes to /data folder of zeronet, delete all zites folders except 08chan folder and then activate netstat for some days. Filtered the zeronet IPs. The IPs collected are of 08chan users.

Then He has separate IPs from TOR and IPs not from TOR by Tor exit node list and check the locations associated to the IPs. Finally put the Filtered IPs to the Map.

1617665358_1LUP6SN7WrXAH7e5bUFxdmrVsFr2m.body:
> [stupidhorse](#comment_12_1EUxRrUu6DfuFtYfeuGJUc4GdTLGj4dunH): NOThanks for the magnet.  I've checked half a dozen friends and none of them are listed in here either.  These records seem wildly incomplete.  I'm starting to wonder if this is actually Cambridge Analytica data.

The magnet link come from [rogu3anuerz2] in a previous 3ad.

> [darkoo](#comment_25_1HmG8hXdvaaMtgoxpkvNXBVfCoB44Yv3aG): cool thanks ! safe file? how big is it?

You can download only your country. The magnet has hundred of country, unzip it you get a small amount of txt file like 0.txt, 1.txt and so on. The files are big so you can parse via shell and in linux you can find a string o a cell number with:

$ cat *.txt | grep "name:surname:"

it take few seconds.
